1. Measure 20 g of germanium (Ge) and place it in a clean mixing bowl. 2. Measure 10 g of lithium (Li) and add it to the bowl. 3. Measure 15 g of praseodymium (Pr) and incorporate it into the mixture. 4. Measure 30 g of silicon (Si) and add it to the bowl. 5. Use a spatula or a mechanical mixer to thoroughly blend the ingredients until homogeneous.

steps: 1. Transfer the blended mixture to a crucible suitable for high-temperature applications. 2. Heat the crucible in a furnace to 1200 째C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and mixing of components.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the blended mixture to a crucible suitable for high-temperature applications. 2. Heat the crucible in a furnace to 1200 째C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and mixing of components.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool gradually to room temperature at a rate of 10 째C per hour to avoid thermal shock. 2. Once cooled, remove the crucible and extract the solid material.
